divs: Sighting Detailsi am with my frind because i sell my older photo camera a nikon d5000 and we are testing the camera and the tripod y gave to him we put the camera on the tripod and we turn on the camera in auto mode my friend and i seen some lights over the ruitoque mountain my frinend action the shutter of the camera and we have a picture of the event the lights disapear in the same way that they appear . i am a profesional videographer and photograph , ans we analize the photo many times ans the read in photoshop tell us that its a solid object in the photo we are send you the case and the file for your review ...... my best regards
